Wondrous Item, Rare (Requires Attunement by a Wizard or Cleric)
The bones of a void saint are dangerous tools, often a dark-purplish color with ends or joints of pale blue, imbued with the unholy power of the Void. While holding them, you gain the ability to cast the @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPconjureminorvo]{conjure minor voidborn} spell once per day. The conjured creatures obey you so long as they are addressed using Void Speech and will remain nearby for up to 1 hour, fighting for you, guarding a location, or undertaking other tasks. In addition, you are resistant to radiant damage.
